meanings.definition: A woman who is a lesbian.
meanings.sent1: Sheila came out as a lesbo last year.
meanings.sent2: The lesbo couple next door is very happy together.
meanings.sent3: Why did the lesbo bring a ladder to the bar? She heard the drinks were on the house!
meanings.sent4: The bond between the two best friends was so strong, they were like sisters, almost like a lesbo connection.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the struggles and triumphs of a young lesbo coming to terms with her identity.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of lesbians.
meanings.sent1: The bookstore had a section dedicated to lesbo literature.
meanings.sent2: Her style is very bold and lesbo, with lots of flannel and combat boots.
meanings.sent3: The party had a lesbo theme, with rainbow decorations and love songs playing all night.
meanings.sent4: The vibrant mural depicted a world where everyone embraced a lesbo lifestyle.
meanings.sent5: The comedian's jokes about lesbo stereotypes were both funny and thought-provoking.
